title: Democrats vs. ‘Health Issues’ | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Brad Thor | 7/23/21
description:
Sen. Amy Klobuchar has a new bill that would make social media sites liable for spreading COVID-19 "misinformation." How often is today’s “misinformation” tomorrow’s truth? Glenn goes through all the “fake news” that ended up being true. Glenn and Stu showcase all the new woke emojis they’ve created to be used by a leftist near you. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the news of the week, including the misinformation crackdown, the latest Capitol riot drama, and his pick for the biggest problem facing America. Author Brad Thor calls in to discuss his latest thriller novel, “Black Ice,” and its parallels to current affairs. Why are Republicans suddenly begging people to get vaccinated?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
